channel.title: United pkz 602 [your final destination]
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i845.photobucket.com/albums/ab17/coolguyvictor/34pltoi-1.jpg[/img][center][/center]
*
Info: Server Name: united pkz Server based off of:pi Owners: eddie
Goals: -fixed dupes -have 100+ players -Great Economy -different from any other server -new maps
A few of our many features
-active forums -Dedicated Server -Vote for Rewards -All Skills Trainable -All bosses you can think of -Active Community & Forums -New Client Interfaces -Friendly Staff -Great combat -Godwars -Public Fight Cave -Working Autocasting -Clue Scrolls -Pvp Armour -Spirit Shields with proper effects -Fully Working ClanChat -Multi Barrage -Perfect Item Switching -Npcs/Monster locations same as on Runescape -Donator special features -Great PK Point system + PK Point Shop
[SIZE="4"]Pictures[/SIZE] safe pk areas for pk without loss of items [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/219xr4j.gif[/img] Slayer point shop for diffrent items such as slayer helmet [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/21mupw1.jpg[/img] all godsword specs work 100% [IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/2q1xo5v.gif[/img] All runescape spells for modern magics, ancients magic and lunar magic [IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/vevn2u.gif[/img] Statius, vesta, zuriel, morrigan [IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/2mmecrq.gif[/img] Fully working ancient curses [IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/1zzgis9.jpg[/img] All chaotic weapons working 100% [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/1znlhsw.gif[/img] Fully working summoning 100% [IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/346xcf8.gif[/img] Fully working coporal beast [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/vrbuvq.png[/img] shops for everything you would need ingame
[b]Spots open[/b]: Gfx designer: 1/2 eddie Beta tester: 1/3 eddie Server Coder: 2/3 Me advertiser 0/12 Ingame Staff: Post information on the thread if applying for.
How to apply for different positons:
[b]Gfx Designer[/b]: [code]Name: Age: Msn: Proof of work: Experience:[/code]
[b]Beta Tester[/b]: [code] Name: Age: How active will you be: Any experience in this?: Msn: [/code]
[b]Coder[/b] [code] Can you code Java: Position: Experience (Scale 1-10): Age: Time you will use a day on the server: Have you had this position in another server: MSN: Skype: [/code]
